BoNet

From Bricowiki

Jump to: navigation, search

BoNet is a community-driven laboratory that researches and practices co-existance in a more intense and sensitive manner.

Bonete - IlhaBela

BoNet has always been a BricoLab interested in weather, sensor networks, co-existance, plants, connectivity infrasctructure like the BricoPhone, Internet Satelite Connection and Wifi-Mesh technology as well as many new media art projects, including "carbon kidnapping".

100 linhas bricolab foundation
